The work of the Holy Spirit is immeasurably great. It is from this source that power and efficiency come to the worker for God. . . . As Christ was glorified on the day of Pentecost, so will He again be glorified in the closing work of the gospel, when He shall prepare a people to stand the final test, in the closing conflict of the great controversy. --Review and Herald Nov. 29, 1892
